author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HENRIETTE RAPIDLY INTENSIFIES INTO A HURRICANE... ...FURTHER STRENGTHENING EXPECTED...
summary: ...HENRIETTE RAPIDLY INTENSIFIES INTO A HURRICANE... ...FURTHER STRENGTHENING EXPECTED... As of 11:00 AM HST Sun Aug 10 the center of Henriette was located near 25.7, -152.5 with movement NW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 990 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...HENRIETTE RAPIDLY INTENSIFIES INTO A HURRICANE... ...FURTHER STRENGTHENING EXPECTED... As of 11:00 AM HST Sun Aug 10 the center of Henriette was located near 25.7, -152.5 with movement NW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 990 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Henriette (CP3/EP082025)
